div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 06:56 am CDT

div.div: Sunny, with a high near 71. Very windy, with a north wind 14 to 19 mph increasing to 26 to 31 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 44 mph.
Clear, with a low around 41. Breezy, with a north wind 16 to 21 mph becoming light and variable in the evening.
Sunny, with a high near 80. South wind 7 to 14 mph.

div.p:
Updated: March 11 , 2020
Play Practice tonight at 6:00. We will run Trikes for Tikes Jock Block, just for the halibur, and failing. Crew members and those not in the scenes do not need to attend.
Don't forget; Play T-shirts are here.
